headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Occidental Petroleum (OXY) In Context Of Broader Oil Industry
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks Jim Cramer Mentioned In An Episode Where He Briefly Commented On Data Centers. Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer discussed Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) after a Wall Street Journal report suggested that Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway would buy the firm’s petrochemical business. […]
